error.signature: cannot call pointer method on value / cannot take the address of
error.regex: cannot call pointer method|cannot take the address of|pointer receiver

verdict.summary: Calling a pointer receiver method on a non-addressable value (like a map value or function return).

dead_ends.why_fails: Unsafe and undefined behavior for non-addressable values

workarounds.action: Store the value in a variable first to make it addressable
workarounds.how:
val := myMap[key]
val.PointerMethod()  // val is addressable

workarounds.action: Change the method to a value receiver if it doesn't modify the struct
workarounds.how: func (s MyStruct) Method() { ... }  // value receiver, works on non-addressable
